text:
Intellifarm | Lincoln, NE | ONSITE | FULL-TIME

IntelliFarm, Inc. is is developing disruptive solutions to automate production agriculture. Its solutions utilize IoT (Internet of Things), data analysis, and automation technologies.

We develop the hardware, firmware and software in-house. We are hiring for a variety of positions:

    Full Stack Web Developer
    Dev Ops Engineer
    Software Development Internship
    Embedded Device Firmware Engineer
Holler at justin.collier@intelli-farm.com if you're interested in helping us solving big problems in farming around the world.
